Description: Subtle scale on click for tactile feedback
Don't: Animate width/height causing layout shift

Description: Card lifts on hover with shadow deepening
Don't: Apply to every element — use selectively

Description: Smooth thumb slide with color transition
Don't: Snap without transition — feels broken

Description: Material-style touch ripple from press point
Do: Use CSS custom properties for position
Don't: Use JS-heavy canvas ripples — GPU overhead

Description: Content fades in while sliding up 20px
Don't: Use scroll event listeners — cause jank

Description: Element scales from 0.8 to 1 with fade
Don't: Apply will-change to many elements at once

Description: Sequential fade-in of list items with delay
Don't: Stagger 50+ items — feels frozen
Accessibility_Note: Ensure content accessible before animation completes

Description: Panel or drawer slides in from side
Don't: Animate left/right — causes layout recalc

Description: Content fades out while sliding down
Don't: Make exit animation same length as entrance
Accessibility_Note: Remove from DOM after animation ends

Description: Accordion-style height collapse with fade
Don't: Animate height directly — needs layout calc each frame

Description: Pulsing placeholder matching content layout
Do: Match skeleton shapes to actual content layout
Don't: Use generic spinners for content-heavy pages

Description: Rotating circle indicator for quick operations
CSS_Code: border: 3px solid rgba(0 0 0/0.1); border-top-color: primary; animation: spin 0.7s linear infinite
Don't: Use spinners for long loads — show skeleton instead

Description: Linear fill bar for determinate operations
Don't: Animate indeterminate bar too fast — causes anxiety

Description: Immediately show expected result then confirm
CSS_Code: Apply state immediately; revert with fade on error
Don't: Wait for server before showing any feedback
Accessibility_Note: Announce errors clearly if rollback occurs

Description: Background moves at different rate than foreground
Do: Use CSS transform-based parallax not JS scroll
Don't: Use scroll listeners for parallax — 60fps impossible

Description: Top bar indicating page read progress
Don't: Recalculate on every scroll pixel with JS

Description: Elements animate in as they enter viewport
Don't: Trigger at threshold 1.0 — user never sees animation

Description: Smooth transition between route changes
Do: Use View Transitions API when available
Don't: Full page fade-to-white between routes

Description: Element morphs between two states/views
Don't: Animate unrelated elements together — confusing
Accessibility_Note: Announce new view content to screen readers

Description: Content cross-fades between tabs
CSS_Code: opacity: 0 → 1 on new panel; 1 → 0 on old
Don't: Slide content left/right for tabs — not spatial

Description: Card swipes away on horizontal drag
Don't: Dismiss on tiny swipes — accidental actions

Description: Overscroll triggers content refresh
Do: Show spinner icon that fills as user pulls
Don't: Auto-refresh without user pulling far enough

Description: Image zooms on pinch gesture
JS_Code: Touch event tracking two-finger distance delta
Don't: Allow infinite zoom — crashes on large images
Accessibility_Note: Provide zoom controls for non-touch users

Description: Animated checkmark draw-in
CSS_Code: stroke-dasharray + stroke-dashoffset animation on SVG path
Do: Use SVG path animation for crisp check
Don't: Toggle background only — boring and unclear

Description: Badge scales in with bounce
CSS_Code: transform: scale(0) → scale(1) with overshoot easing
Don't: Pop without animation — user misses it
Accessibility_Note: Announce new notification count via aria-live

Description: Slide in from top/bottom with auto-dismiss
JS_Code: setTimeout for auto-dismiss + clearTimeout on hover
Don't: Auto-dismiss errors — user needs to read them
Accessibility_Note: Use role=alert for errors and role=status for info

Description: Content reveals with height + fade animation
Do: Use CSS grid row animation for smooth height
Don't: Animate max-height with arbitrary large value

Description: Items animate to new positions on sort
CSS_Code: Use FLIP technique: First Last Invert Play
Do: Use FLIP pattern for layout animations
Don't: Remove + re-add items — no position continuity
Accessibility_Note: Announce reorder to screen readers via aria-live

Description: Items reflow smoothly on container resize
CSS_Code: transition: all 200ms ease on grid children
Do: Use CSS container queries for responsive grids
Don't: Snap to new layout without transition

Description: Background gradient slowly cycles colors
Do: Keep color shift subtle — max 10% hue variation
Don't: Rapid psychedelic color cycling — induces nausea

Description: Subtle floating dots/shapes in background
CSS_Code: CSS animation with random delays and positions
Don't: Use canvas with 200+ particles — kills battery

Description: Custom cursor with trailing effect
Do: Use sparingly on portfolio/creative sites only
Don't: Add to all pages — distracting and battery drain
Accessibility_Note: Never on mobile or touch devices

Description: Hint browser about upcoming animations
Do: Apply just before animation starts then remove
Don't: Apply will-change to everything — wastes GPU memory

Description: Sync JS animations to display refresh rate
Do: Use rAF for all JS-driven animations
Don't: Use setInterval for animations — causes frame drops

Description: Animate only transform and opacity
Do: Stick to transform and opacity for 60fps
Don't: Animate margin padding width height — trigger layout

Description: Respect user motion preferences
Don't: Ignore user preference — causes vestibular issues

Description: Subtle ring animation on keyboard focus
CSS_Code: outline: 2px solid var(--focus-color); outline-offset: 2px; transition: outline-offset 150ms
Don't: Remove all focus styles with outline:none

Description: Consistent duration hierarchy
Do: Use CSS custom properties for consistent timing
Don't: Magic number durations scattered through codebase
Accessibility_Note: No a11y impact — use reduced-motion to override

Description: Standardized easing functions
Do: Use named easing tokens for consistency
Don't: Mix random easing values — feels inconsistent

Description: Consistent stagger timing for lists
Do: Cap total stagger at ~400ms (5 items visible)
Don't: Stagger 20+ items with long delays
Accessibility_Note: Ensure content accessible before animation ends
